title: Mercedes Benz typeface for model designations
content:
can anyone help me? I'm looking for the typeface for the Mercedes Benz model designations on their automobiles. For Example, what is the typeface for the word "Kompressor" on the side of their cars?

 [‹ (x) Typefaces: technical drawing - various {gang}](http://web.archive.org/web/20071212172643/http:/www.typophile.com/node/4319 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Citibank - Interstate, OCRK Square (customized) {Randy, Yves} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071212172643/http:/www.typophile.com/node/4299 "Go to next forum topic")
author: anonymous

comments.content: I was going to suggest [corporate A](%20http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/corporate-a/regular/testdrive.html?s=S500&p=48) until I realized that the numbers on the back are completely different and probably custom.
